TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AutodiscoverRedirectionUrlValidationCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function AutodiscoverRedirectionUrlValidationCallback(redirectionUrl As String) As Boolean

Docs.param: The redirection URL that Autodiscover is to use.
Docs.summary: Defines a delegate that is used by the AutodiscoverService class to determine whether a redirection URL can be used.
Docs.returns: true if Autodiscover is enabled to use this URL; otherwise, false.
